Delta Air Lines takes several measures to ensure the safety and security of their passengers, crew, and employees. Here are some of them:

1. Advanced Security Screening: Delta Air Lines uses state-of-the-art security screening technology, including advanced imaging scanners, to screen passengers and their luggage at check-in and boarding.

2. Strict Baggage Rules: Delta Air Lines has strict baggage rules and limits for all passengers to ensure that all checked bags are safe and secure.

3. Continuous Aircraft Maintenance: Delta Air Lines has a comprehensive aircraft maintenance program that ensures all aircraft are maintained to strict standards for safety and reliability.

4. Regular Security Drills: Delta Air Lines conducts regular emergency response and security drills to ensure that employees are prepared to respond effectively to any situation.

5. Pioneering Safety Standards: Delta Air Lines has been a leader in developing innovative safety standards and practices, such as their industry-leading Aircrew Portable Rest Compartments.

6. Highly Trained Staff: Delta Air Lines has highly trained staff, including pilots, flight attendants, and ground crew, who are prepared to handle any situation that may arise.

Overall, Delta Air Lines is committed to ensuring the safety and security of their passengers and employees, and they have implemented a variety of measures to achieve this goal.
